author: flare(flare#0001)
install_msg:
Command Statistics, Check out commands used in a guild, globally or in the current session(while the cog is loaded). Note to developers: This cog allows you to record 3rd party events using the `on_commandstats_action_v2` listener.
This command will save the data to config every 5 minutes to prevent loss of data.
name: CommandStats
description: Track all commands used globally, guild wise and during the current session.
